On Tue, 2005-06-21 at 15:11 +0100, Nicholas Piper wrote:
> Hi,
> 
> I would like to be able to specify in each TestCase which customer
> requirement (a string identifier) that test contributes towards.
> 
Are you sure junit is the right tool for this?  I would suggest
something along the lines of Fit/Fitnesse.  Those are more aligned
toward acceptance testing rather than low-level unit testing.
